mapper.update:
update sms_send_details
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_send_time = #{taskSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
real_send_time = #{realSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_employ = #{isEmploy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext_video_id = #{extVideoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_code = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sms_send_details set admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time =#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_send_time = #{taskSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, real_send_time = #{realSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_employ = #{isEmploy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_video_id = #{extVideoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_code = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT characteristic FROM sms_send_details WHERE supplier_code =#{code} AND characteristic IS NOT NULL AND is_send =0 AND assessor = 1 GROUP BY characteristic
SELECT * FROM sms_send_details WHERE supplier_code = #{code} AND characteristic IS NOT NULL AND is_send = 0 AND assessor = 1 AND characteristic = #{characteristic}
mapper.update: update sms_send_details SET assessor =2, is_send =1 WHERE supplier_code = #{code} AND characteristic = #{characteristic}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sms_send_details WHERE characteristic = #{msId} AND is_employ = 0
